resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
Exemple of an annotation that has been embedded in the main text at some point during the textual transmission of Pomponius Porphyrion's commentary on Horace.
English translation: Read Pomponius's commentary on Horace which I consulted in Lorsch.
resource.chars:
Exemple of an annotation that has been embedded in the main text at some point during the textual transmission of Pomponius Porphyrion's commentary on Horace.

English translation: Read Pomponius's commentary on Horace which I consulted in Lorsch.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
Most recent annotation (different lighter ink).
The Irish schoolmaster is here giving us the name of the person responsible for the annotation embedded in the main text: Sed for Sedulius Scottus, one of the most reputed schoolmasters in ninth-century Europe.
resource.chars:
Most recent annotation (different lighter ink).

The Irish schoolmaster is here giving us the name of the person responsible for the annotation embedded in the main text: Sed for Sedulius Scottus, one of the most reputed schoolmasters in ninth-century Europe.
